{/* Course Header */}

🎓 Career Guidance

Unlock your career potential with **mentorship, resume building, interview prep, and skill assessment**. Designed for students and professionals seeking growth.

₹30,000 ₹14,999 🔥 50% OFF
{/* Course Info */}

📘 Course Overview

  • 🕒 Duration: 3 Months
  • 📚 Level: All Levels
  • 🌐 Language: English
  • 🎓 Certification: Yes
  • 👨‍🏫 Mentorship: Included
{/* What You Will Learn */}

🚀 What You Will Learn

  • Career Roadmap & Skill Gap Analysis
  • Resume Building & Portfolio Creation
  • Interview Preparation & Mock Interviews
  • Soft Skills & Communication Training
  • Job Search Strategies & Networking
  • Mentorship from Industry Experts
{/* Enroll Button */}
); }
